column1: Accordingly, of 17 genes in our list that were previously shown to be up - regulated directly or indirectly by HlyX under anaerobiosis, 12 ( dnaX, visC, dsbC, mazG, amiB, cpxC, dacA, rpoZ, APL _ 0086, APL _ 1597, APL _ 1802 and APL _ 2043) were down - regulated in vivo, while only 5 ( sohB, mglB, hybB, APL _ 0096 and APL _ 0920) were up - regulated.
